means: 再（出）现( reappear的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: For instance, in broadcast music and video frequency time, the media key shines is reappearing.
sentence.Network_cn: 比如, 在播放音乐和视频的时候, 媒体键是亮着浮现的.

sentence.Network_en: It was queer how the TV picture kept reappearing even though the lights didn't flicker.
sentence.Network_cn: 很奇怪,即使信号灯不闪烁,电视图像也一直时隐时现.

sentence.Network_en: Image a reappearing of situation truly, and the aspect of mood is a distillation of situation.
sentence.Network_cn: 物境是情境的“真实”再现, 意境是情境的情感升华.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Stanford vanished this summer , later reappearing , admitting to an extramarital affair ., Stanford 今年夏天突然消失 , 随后又再次出现 , 承认其婚外情.

list.abs: contrast on color reappearance between grey manila board and ivory board ., 灰底白板纸与白卡纸色彩再现性能比较.
on consistency of printing color reappearance ., 谈谈印刷颜色再现的一致性.
其中学习者个体石化表现在两个方面：(1)错误石化（error reappearance），表现为被纠正多次的，并被认为已清除了的错误的重复出 …
... fossilization) ,其中个人石化包括错误重复(error reappearance) 和语言能力石化(competence fossilization) 。
cad of reappearance function flat connecting rod machine ., 再现函数平面连杆机构的计算机辅助设计.
翻译既是语言转换的媒介，又是两种文化间交流的桥梁，它是文化的再现（culture reappearance）。（剩余3903字）

entry.def: When people or things reappear, they return again after they have been away or out of sight for some time.

example.ex: Thirty seconds later she reappeared and beckoned them forward.
example.tran: 30秒后她又出现了，示意他们往前来。

auth_sentence.content: That way there's no chance of it reappearing.
auth_sentence.res_content: That way there's no chance of it reappearing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That way there's no chance of it reappearing.

auth_sentence.content: Ladbrokes said that it cut the odds of snow reappearing in any major city during Easter weekend to even money.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ladbrokes said that it cut the odds of snow reappearing in any major city during Easter weekend to even money.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ladbrokes said that it cut the odds of snow reappearing in any major city during Easter weekend to even money.

auth_sentence.content: That polar bear kept reappearing like the humans, he, too, was not supposed to be there.
